stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Payday Loan Laws in Texas
stateCompliance.content: Grand Prairie residents are protected by Texas lending regulations administered by the Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner (OCCC). Texas allows payday loans through licensed Credit Access Businesses (CABs), and Ace Payday Loans is fully licensed and compliant with all state requirements.
keyPoints: Texas allows payday loans through licensed Credit Access Businesses (CABs) regulated by the OCCC
There is no state cap on interest rates or CAB fees - typical APRs range from 400% to 700%+
You have the right to cancel your loan within 3 days of signing without penalty
Lenders cannot threaten criminal prosecution for non-payment (except for fraud)
Your wages cannot be garnished for payday loan debt under Texas law
Your home (if declared homestead) is protected from debt collection
Always verify your lender is licensed at occc.texas.gov before borrowing
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: Texas Office of Consumer Credit Commissioner (OCCC)

warningBox.title: Important Cost Warning
warningBox.content: Payday loans in Texas are among the most expensive in the nation. A typical $300 loan can cost over $1,000 in fees alone, resulting in APRs exceeding 700%. Consider alternatives such as credit union loans, payment plans with creditors, or nonprofit credit counseling before taking out a payday loan.

stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal advice. Payday loan laws and regulations change frequently. For the most accurate and up-to-date information, contact the Texas OCCC at (800) 538-1579 or visit occc.texas.gov. If you need legal advice, please consult with a licensed attorney in Texas.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Cities
nearbyLocations.intro: Cannot make it to our Grand Prairie location? We also serve:

faq.question: Where is your Grand Prairie location?
faq.answer: Our Grand Prairie branch is located at 2847 W Pioneer Parkway, Suite 105, near Epic Waters Indoor Waterpark. Take I-30 Exit 33 (Carrier Parkway) for the quickest route.

faq.question: What are your hours in Grand Prairie?
faq.answer: We are open Monday through Friday 9 AM to 7 PM, and Saturday 10 AM to 4 PM. We are closed on Sundays.

faq.question: How much can I borrow at the Grand Prairie location?
faq.answer: Loan amounts depend on your income and ability to repay. Texas has no state maximum for payday loans. We will work with you to find an amount that fits your budget.

faq.question: Do I need an appointment at the Grand Prairie branch?
faq.answer: No appointment needed. Walk-ins are welcome during business hours. You can also apply online first to speed up the in-store process.

faq.question: What do I need to bring to the Grand Prairie location?
faq.answer: Bring a valid government ID, proof of income (pay stub or bank statement), and an active checking account. For title loans, also bring your vehicle and clear title.
